name: Urban Propensity
description:
Urban Propensity is a game about two friends, Eve and Flo. Their goal is to explore the city and find the best views. Can you get to the end flag at the right of the screen to help them see the great views of the city?

References: 

We got the background music from:  https://soundimage.org/city-urban/

This is our submission for the Brackey's game jam. People involved in this project are:

  1. Ludo West.
  2. Scott Baldwin.
  3. Jack Kellett.
